title: Bet - System Pre Game
body:
Make a personal bet system role focused with ip or rp f.e.

- last hitting 5 dragons
- betting on getting first blood
- killing 300 minions under 15 min

etc.

replies.body: In a Featured Game Mode maybe, but adding any kind of achievement system distracts from the actual goals of the match. Plus you'd get bet fixing.
"distracts from the actual goals" but that the idea {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=fReAkThEzOiD,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZLIgURgz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-30T02:03:02.463+0000)
>
> "distracts from the actual goals" but that the idea {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

what goals ? feeding enemy team ? Make ur own bet game if ur team sucks. Bet on ur team sucking !

Oh great, you'd get allies that troll and give up first blood or take your cs just so that you lose your bet.  This would make the game worse.  Or you bet a whole lot when your friend happens to be on the enemy team who lets you win the bet.  It just would have too many problems that would mess up games.
